company_description: Back Market is an online marketplace for refurbished electronic devices, offering a wide range of certified refurbished smartphones, laptops, and other electronics at discounted prices.
founders: Quentin Le Brouster, Thibaud Hug de Larauze, Vianney Vaute
embedding_text: Back Market is an online marketplace for refurbished electronic devices, offering a wide range of certified refurbished smartphones, laptops, and other electronics at discounted prices.
